name: kcoleman
text: I believe you can do this using the REST Management API method PUT /manage/v2/databases/{dbid}/properties. If you pass a payload in which the range-element-indexes property is empty, I think it removes any existing ones. Take a look at the following: http://docs.marklogic.com/REST/PUT/manage/v2/databases/[id-or-name]/properties You'd want to use a payload similar to the following for XML: Or like this for JSON: { "range-element-index": [] } Be careful, though: It's a sharp tool. You'll also delete pre-defined indexes like the ones for DLS. I think that's also true of Tamas' solution, but did not confirm.
